summary: The document is a historical record from INSCOM/CSF, detailing an investigation into Manuel Marti, also known by several aliases, including Adrian Martes and Adrian Sotomayor. It includes information about a local agency check conducted by the FBI in New York, providing details on Marti's father, Adrian Sotomayor, with discrepancies noted in the birth date. The document references multiple FBI reports on the subject's father, some of which were already in possession of Military Intelligence.
key_findings: Manuel Marti is the subject of a military intelligence investigation, with multiple aliases noted.
Discrepancy in the birth date of Marti's father, Adrian Sotomayor, as reported by the FBI.
The document references several FBI reports on Adrian Sotomayor, indicating a detailed background check.
The investigation was conducted by the 108th MI Group, with the document being part of a series on DOD-affiliated personnel incident investigations.
